snippet: Germany’s trade surplus with other members of the euro zone has plummeted since the beginning of 2012, but has risen with countries outside the European Union.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s trade surplus with other members of the euro zone has plummeted since the beginning of 2012, but has risen with countries outside the European Union.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: Germany’s Trade Within the Euro Zone Falls
headline.main: Off the Charts: Germany’s Trade Within the Euro Zone Falls
